5. David Fritz

# David Fritz

![Dave bio pic](https://cityofwashougal.us/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=2116 "Dave bio pic")

## David fritz, Council Position 3

Phone: 360-835-8501, ext. 113  
Term Expires: December 2025  
[Email David Fritz](mailto:david.fritz@cityofwashougal.us)

## Biography

Dave was appointed to City Council on October 24, 2022.  He was elected in November 2023 to fill Position 3, an unexpired term.  His term expires on December 31, 2025. He has called Washougal home since 2014.  Dave has two sons who grew up in Washougal and appreciates the quality of life that Washougal offers for raising a family.   

## Employment

Dave has worked in the private sector for many years with extensive experience in commercial real estate, real estate development, business development, and finance.  

He holds a Bachelor of Arts in Political Science and Master’s Degree in Business.  

## Community Service

Dave is an avid outdoors person and participates in a wide variety of outdoor recreation.  He serves as an active volunteer with the Washington Trails Association and has previously served as a Climbing Steward with the Mount Saint Helen’s Institute for five years.   Around town, Dave has been involved with Unite Washougal, Re-Fuel, the Camas Ivy League, and various community service projects.
